item.title: One File System Configuration with NixOS and Emacs Org-Mode
item.description: Introduction This article describes my attempts to create a set of https://leanpub.com/lit-config/read. With each file containing all the settings and customizations I use for a machine in a single location.

item.title: A Linux Journey Retrospective
item.description: As a part of writing the "https://ironshark.org/technology/2022/09/04/linux-journey.html" article, and my larger project of switching to https://nixos.org/ for daily use. I decided to go through all of the https://linuxjourney.com/ lessons again.

item.title: Who, what, and Why. Creating a personal blog.
item.description: Personal blogging can take a lot of forms, and the goals for each site can vary wildly from person to person. For me, those goals are. Create a public facing outlet for written works.
